hooks.command: if ! command -v gh &> /dev/null; then curl -sL https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/download/v2.63.2/gh_2.63.2_linux_amd64.tar.gz -o /tmp/gh.tar.gz && tar -xzf /tmp/gh.tar.gz -C /tmp && sudo mv /tmp/gh_2.63.2_linux_amd64/bin/gh /usr/local/bin/ && rm -rf /tmp/gh.tar.gz /tmp/gh_2.63.2_linux_amd64; fi
